titleStmt.title: Contemplations, sighes, and groanes of a Christian. Written in Latine, by Iohn Michael Dilherrus. And Englished by William Style of the Inner Temple, Esquire
Contemplationes et suspiria hominis Christiani. English
titleStmt.author: Dilherr, Johannes Michael, 1604-1669.
Style, William, 1603-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Bishop, for William Lee, and are to be sold at the Great Turks Head, next to the Mitre Taverne in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Contemplationes et suspiria hominis Christiani.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Great Turks Head, next to the Mitre Taverne in Fleet-street
